column1: Wireless Earbuds, yobola Bluetoth Earbuds, IPX5 Waterproof Wireless Headphones Touch Control, Bluetoth Headphones 5.1 Built-in Microphone, 25 Hrs with USB-C Charging with Running/Fitness
column3: So I never write reviews online, but feel compelled to do so for this purchase because of how blown away I am by these earbuds.I can't find my t14's for the life of me and, upon the pre-gym self-loathing in my truck today (lol) at the thought of a workout without them, I began browsing Amazon for the same pair.Sadly, I couldn't find them, but I am happy to have happened upon these!Not only did they show up in less than 6 hours from the moment I ordered them in the gym parking lot (seriously Amazon, this is getting a bit scary haha!), but I just tested them out and am blown away at the sound quality I received for only having spent $25 (plus tax it came out to around 27)! They paired in under a minute as well.I'm deaf in my left ear, so wearing both buds can be superfluous, but these actually give off enough bass to give me the sensation of "hearing" on my deaf side. For those who dont understand, because I only went deaf in that ear 2 years ago, it helps u feel less "imbalanced", so it's a HUGE plus for me with my vertigo. You can still tell there's some sort of sound happening.The only downside I can see is that, when I went to test them, they seemed a bit larger than my old ones. However, I haven't worn my old ones in a very long time, as I've been going to the gym with a friend and enjoying her company instead, so I'm hoping my ears just have to adapt to them.Overall, I'm very pleased with my purchase and hope you are too if you order these! :)Ps- the packaging they came in was also very nice. They're encased in the black foam you'd typically see in gun cases, or cases for musical instruments and such, not some cheap plastic. Not sure if this matters, but it makes me feel like the company is just putting a little extra thought into their customer's experience!

column1: Wireless Earbuds, yobola Bluetoth Earbuds, IPX5 Waterproof Wireless Headphones Touch Control, Bluetoth Headphones 5.1 Built-in Microphone, 25 Hrs with USB-C Charging with Running/Fitness
column3: I paid $25 for these wireless buds, so I wasn't expecting much, but I gotta tell you these things are amazing for the price. To be honest I can't find a fault with them.Are they as good as Airpods?They are very close, sound quality is very good, fit and finish is very good, playback time is very good, charging time is very good and they have volume control which is rare on Bluetooth buds. They also instantly pair up.At this price range you can't find a better Bluetooth bud, trust me, I have a drawer full of crappy $25 buds.Great job Yobola, you gave us a very, very good product at the same price it costs to get two combo meals at a fast food restaurant.I am very pleased with these buds, wish I could leave more than five stars.

column1: Wireless Earbuds, yobola Bluetoth Earbuds, IPX5 Waterproof Wireless Headphones Touch Control, Bluetoth Headphones 5.1 Built-in Microphone, 25 Hrs with USB-C Charging with Running/Fitness
column3: These work great for me! I use them on my walks and working around the house when listening to podcasts and audiobooks. My daughter (6 yo) used them on the plane and they even fit her little ears. There is a crackling every now and then in one ear bud, but other than that they sound fine. I got the pink pair and they're a great color.

column1: Wireless Earbuds, yobola Bluetoth Earbuds, IPX5 Waterproof Wireless Headphones Touch Control, Bluetoth Headphones 5.1 Built-in Microphone, 25 Hrs with USB-C Charging with Running/Fitness
column3: These earbuds have great sound quality and they fit good in my ears.  They feel and sound about the same as a set of Apple Air Pods.  You definitely get your money's worth!  My only complaint is that they sometimes disconnect from my phone when they are playing music.  That is the only reason I gave them 4 stars instead of 5.  Other than that, they are a great buy, and I would definitely buy them again!

column1: Wireless Earbuds, yobola Bluetoth Earbuds, IPX5 Waterproof Wireless Headphones Touch Control, Bluetoth Headphones 5.1 Built-in Microphone, 25 Hrs with USB-C Charging with Running/Fitness
column3: If you’re looking for a cheap and easy pair of headphones- you’ve found them. I’m not technologically inclined but these were basic and to the point. I am also rather clumsy- and they’ve proved to be drop resistant thus far! I have a hard time with the comfort of any ‘in ear’ headphone so I can’t say they fit well but that could be a personal problem. Overall I was impressed!

column1: Wireless Earbuds, yobola Bluetoth Earbuds, IPX5 Waterproof Wireless Headphones Touch Control, Bluetoth Headphones 5.1 Built-in Microphone, 25 Hrs with USB-C Charging with Running/Fitness
column3: I picked these up to listen go music while at my sewing machine and to cut out background noise while doing it. I also didn't want to pay the crazy prices of Samsung and Apple earbuds. They work surprisingly well, especially considering their price. They have done everything I needed them to do and they can be synced to two devices. I also love the color options, especially the pink. Would recommend and buy again.

column1: Wireless Earbuds, yobola Bluetoth Earbuds, IPX5 Waterproof Wireless Headphones Touch Control, Bluetoth Headphones 5.1 Built-in Microphone, 25 Hrs with USB-C Charging with Running/Fitness
column3: These are working great so far about a week in. Box came wrapped in cellophane. Easy to pair with my phone for listening to music at work. Fit is good for just sitting and working.  Sound quality is good for my purposes. I have only one in most of the time on low volume. Phone use works well too. Callers are able to hear me just fine. I am able to walk several offices away from my phone with no disruption. I bought a second pair for my husband.

column1: Wireless Earbuds, yobola Bluetoth Earbuds, IPX5 Waterproof Wireless Headphones Touch Control, Bluetoth Headphones 5.1 Built-in Microphone, 25 Hrs with USB-C Charging with Running/Fitness
column3: I have been looking for a pair of wireless earbuds for a long time. I came across these yobola T9 Wireless Earbuds and they were the perfect fit for me. Not only is the pink color so pretty but they also were so easy to pair up and the sound quality was excellent. The shape of the earbuds fit just right in my ear to where they stay secure in my ears without hurting them. The price is also very affordable compared to other brands that don't work as well so I highly recommend this product to my friends and family.

column1: Wireless Earbuds, yobola Bluetoth Earbuds, IPX5 Waterproof Wireless Headphones Touch Control, Bluetoth Headphones 5.1 Built-in Microphone, 25 Hrs with USB-C Charging with Running/Fitness
column3: These are okay, especially for the price. But these do not fit my ears at all and are constantly falling out. There’s always a ticking noise when I pause my audiobook and I don’t know if that’s from the audiobook or the headphones but it’s a constant and I can plow through an audiobook in a few days time. All the books are through different production groups and the ticking is ALWAYS there. That’s why I feel it might be the earbuds. Battery life is great. The magnet that holds them in the case is nice and strong. Just wish the battery was displayed on the front so I knew when to charge. Overall I am happy with the purchase.

column1: Wireless Earbuds, yobola Bluetoth Earbuds, IPX5 Waterproof Wireless Headphones Touch Control, Bluetoth Headphones 5.1 Built-in Microphone, 25 Hrs with USB-C Charging with Running/Fitness
column3: I ordered these for deep sleep meditation. The 1st pair had a slight low toned humming sound in the left earbud. I answered a few questions via the seller on Amazon and a brand new pair was shipped out the very next day! UPS came to pick up the previous pair but I missed them and they left a shipping label for me to return at my local UPS Store free of charge. I love the product and I love the service! I’m an Apple fanatic… all of my devices are Apple and these compliment them excellently! High quality sound and design. I highly recommend this product and Seller. Thank you!

column1: Wireless Earbuds, yobola Bluetoth Earbuds, IPX5 Waterproof Wireless Headphones Touch Control, Bluetoth Headphones 5.1 Built-in Microphone, 25 Hrs with USB-C Charging with Running/Fitness
column3: I don’t even know how apple AirPods are on the market with these things available. These work just the same! They have great sound and easy instructions in follow. I use only one airpod at work at a time and lasts about 6-7 hours. My apple AirPods had a charging malfunction just a few months into using them so I’ll prob never spend that much on AirPods knowing that’s an issue. These are perfect!

column1: Wireless Earbuds, yobola Bluetoth Earbuds, IPX5 Waterproof Wireless Headphones Touch Control, Bluetoth Headphones 5.1 Built-in Microphone, 25 Hrs with USB-C Charging with Running/Fitness
column3: Yes, my AirPods broke. My first instinct was to grab another box with Apple product but Amazon played a decent trick on me - they displayed other headphones that "look like" AirPods but cost small fraction of what Apple is asking. Is there any catch? Well, after reading reviews of YOBOLA wireless headphones I was convinced that it is more than worth to give them a try especially that price was so much more palatable than Apple's AirPods. There is not much point writing long review about headphones so I will be brief. After comparing AirPods (2nd generation) to Yobola, the latter one is a clear winner. Why?1. Sounds quality - Yobola sounds better especially in the lower range - i.e. much better bass2. Features - Yobola lets you adjust volume just by touch - something that Airpods cannot do. Other than that both Apple and Yobola are quite similar. BTW integration with an iPhone is flawless with both pairs of headphones3. Price -  you can get 5 Yobola headphones for the price of one Apple productIn summary I am giving YOBOLA 5 stars. Definitely worth a try

column1: Wireless Earbuds, yobola Bluetoth Earbuds, IPX5 Waterproof Wireless Headphones Touch Control, Bluetoth Headphones 5.1 Built-in Microphone, 25 Hrs with USB-C Charging with Running/Fitness
column3: I got these for my wife a few weeks ago, and she really likes them. They fit her ears well, the sound is great and the charging case is - well, a charging case. She actually lost one after a week or two, so we bought a second set - which is really the best vote of confidence we can give.

column1: Wireless Earbuds, yobola Bluetoth Earbuds, IPX5 Waterproof Wireless Headphones Touch Control, Bluetoth Headphones 5.1 Built-in Microphone, 25 Hrs with USB-C Charging with Running/Fitness
column3: Overall these are great.  I was looking at getting AirPods (2nd generation) and needed something quick.  I had my coworker test these against his AirPods.  He couldn’t tell the difference.  He was amazed.  They are fantastic for the money.  I have the boltune earbuds also.  These blow them out of the water.Note: Clean them before using.  There is a post manufacturing film or something on the microphone that causes you to sound muffled to others.  Once cleaned, I never had an issue and everyone says they can hear me loud and clear.Battery life is decent.

column1: Wireless Earbuds, yobola Bluetoth Earbuds, IPX5 Waterproof Wireless Headphones Touch Control, Bluetoth Headphones 5.1 Built-in Microphone, 25 Hrs with USB-C Charging with Running/Fitness
column3: I bought four pairs of these earbuds for my kids to use in our car when traveling. They were extremely affordable, and I love that they come in different colors and that they charge automatically in the case. They are easy to use and fit people with small ears or large ears. I feel like it was a great quality product for a good value! I am very happy that we chose these.

column1: Wireless Earbuds, yobola Bluetoth Earbuds, IPX5 Waterproof Wireless Headphones Touch Control, Bluetoth Headphones 5.1 Built-in Microphone, 25 Hrs with USB-C Charging with Running/Fitness
column3: I purchased this product as a cheaper version to hold me over until I could afford something a little better. That being said, I'm pleased with them for the price. There is absolutely no noise cancellation but I did not purchase them for that. It gives me something to focus on in a social setting. Four stars just for that.

column1: Wireless Earbuds, yobola Bluetoth Earbuds, IPX5 Waterproof Wireless Headphones Touch Control, Bluetoth Headphones 5.1 Built-in Microphone, 25 Hrs with USB-C Charging with Running/Fitness

These are an incredible replacement, and the range between my phone and these is even better than my AirPods. The sound quality is equivalent. I am so impressed! What a steal!

column1: Wireless Earbuds, yobola Bluetoth Earbuds, IPX5 Waterproof Wireless Headphones Touch Control, Bluetoth Headphones 5.1 Built-in Microphone, 25 Hrs with USB-C Charging with Running/Fitness
column3: Great for $20 headphones, I love that they automatically connect to Bluetooth once out of the case. The touch controls is difficult. But over all great, would buy again.

Fit works well for my ears. I keep them slightly loose as I like to hear atmospheric noise and traffic, so I cannot comment on the complete noise cancellation if that is important to you. Highly recommend you give these a shot - you will not be disappointed.

column1: Wireless Earbuds, yobola Bluetoth Earbuds, IPX5 Waterproof Wireless Headphones Touch Control, Bluetoth Headphones 5.1 Built-in Microphone, 25 Hrs with USB-C Charging with Running/Fitness

column1: Wireless Earbuds, yobola Bluetoth Earbuds, IPX5 Waterproof Wireless Headphones Touch Control, Bluetoth Headphones 5.1 Built-in Microphone, 25 Hrs with USB-C Charging with Running/Fitness
column3: I bought these with pretty low expectations, as I had another pair of cheap ear buds that were fine for phone calls and watching videos, etc., but were awful for music.  THESE ARE ACTUALLY PRETTY GOOD FOR MUSIC.  The bass is full, the mids are clear, the highs are crisp.  Sound-wise, I'd rate these just as good as Airpods (which I had but accidentally ran through the wash!).

column1: Wireless Earbuds, yobola Bluetoth Earbuds, IPX5 Waterproof Wireless Headphones Touch Control, Bluetoth Headphones 5.1 Built-in Microphone, 25 Hrs with USB-C Charging with Running/Fitness

column1: Wireless Earbuds, yobola Bluetoth Earbuds, IPX5 Waterproof Wireless Headphones Touch Control, Bluetoth Headphones 5.1 Built-in Microphone, 25 Hrs with USB-C Charging with Running/Fitness
column3: Overall, pretty good for $20. I'm honestly impressed.They stay in my ears while I work, they fit in those airpod cases (see picture), and they last about 7h before they need to go back in the case to charge.  Almost a full shift! I'm honestly enjoying that I can look like I can afford the expensive airpods while not spending all that much money.As long as your ears are clean They stay in pretty well and only fall out if I Bob my head. column1: Wireless Earbuds, yobola Bluetoth Earbuds, IPX5 Waterproof Wireless Headphones Touch Control, Bluetoth Headphones 5.1 Built-in Microphone, 25 Hrs with USB-C Charging with Running/Fitness

column1: Wireless Earbuds, yobola Bluetoth Earbuds, IPX5 Waterproof Wireless Headphones Touch Control, Bluetoth Headphones 5.1 Built-in Microphone, 25 Hrs with USB-C Charging with Running/Fitness
column3: I have other more expensive earbuds before buying this pair.  I found this pair is working as well, if not better, as the ones I used to have.  I see some of the cons in other reviews but I found none of the issues people mentioned.  I never had any issues connecting to a phone or to a computer even if those devices have other Bluetooth devices configured.  Just be sure to check if any other Bluetooth devices have been actively connected while you're trying to make a connection.  If so, just disconnect (not remove) the others before attempting to make a new connection.  This pair of Bluetooth earbuds work well for me and that's all I need.

column1: Wireless Earbuds, yobola Bluetoth Earbuds, IPX5 Waterproof Wireless Headphones Touch Control, Bluetoth Headphones 5.1 Built-in Microphone, 25 Hrs with USB-C Charging with Running/Fitness

My only gripe about these is that the Bluetooth signal is kind of weak, I'm not sure if that is common with Wireless earbuds but if I put my phone in my back pocket and have my earbuds in sometimes the signal interrupts in one earbud or the other if I twist my body just right so I try to keep my phone in a front pocket if I can help it and it works just fine. It also works just fine if I have my phone laying nearby while I'm working out. The price and quality you get can't be beat, if your questioning yourself on ordering these just go ahead and do it, give them a try.

I’m at the gym” so for a quick reply, they’re fine. The sound quality of the music is really good and the battery life seems good too! column1: Wireless Earbuds, yobola Bluetoth Earbuds, IPX5 Waterproof Wireless Headphones Touch Control, Bluetoth Headphones 5.1 Built-in Microphone, 25 Hrs with USB-C Charging with Running/Fitness
column3: I purchased these as a backup for my airpods. I wanted something I could carry around the city and not fear the financial pain of losing one of the ear buds. These are well priced ($20 -  not worth more than that). The sound quality for music is perfectly fine - to the people complaining about the sound quality - go buy the $150 - $250 Apple Airpods or Samsung pods, and chill, these are not meant to replace those.Sound quality for music: 7/10 (a lot of bass, and sounds very full; somewhat cancels noise)Sound quality for talk: 8/10 (excellent quality - my 64 year old mom could hear me perfectly and I could hear her quite well also)Range: Decent, as people have been saying, you can walk several feet away and quality will be fine.CONSI expect the battery life to be sub par (for long trips I would bring along my airpods). I'm sure these won't last anywhere near 12 or 24 hours.THESE DO NOT PAIR WITH MACBOOK PRO M1 LAPTOPS.For me, this was the biggest letdown. Apple has a new line of computers that fall under the M1 chip. Unfortunately, these earbuds do not pair with the new laptops. So just be aware that if you have a Macbook you may not be able to use these buds with your laptop.I DO recommend purchasing these as a backup pair of earbuds, but I would not purchase these again knowing that they are not compatible with the M1 Macbook Pro line.

column1: Wireless Earbuds, yobola Bluetoth Earbuds, IPX5 Waterproof Wireless Headphones Touch Control, Bluetoth Headphones 5.1 Built-in Microphone, 25 Hrs with USB-C Charging with Running/Fitness
column3: Lost my AirPods, needed a quick pair of wireless earbuds to tie me over until I replaced the AirPods.Now Let’s be clear, for the price paid ~~~$25.49 - 30% = $17.84~~~ the sound quality is astronomically outstanding. I was expecting crap sounding wireless Bluetooth earbuds with a semi ok mic, what I got was decent sounding earpiece and ok mic. I can take calls, listen to YouTube videos and playback music. Each sounds okay at best and for my quick needs, it’s a solution.These were design with a specific individual in-mind and it works. Now this only takes until account the sound quality and not the design as they feel STUPIDLY CHEAP and flimsy. But beggars can’t be choosers.Now these are NOT AirPods killers or replacements, but are a convenient quick fix simple solution to a pair of wireless earbuds for taking calls and video playback and that’s exactly what I was looking for.They’re cheap, affordable and decent. Would I buy again? Sure for the same price. If the price is higher than $20 then No I wouldn’t as other brand make better quality products (like SkullCandy, JBL, and Anker) for $10-$20 more.These are a bargain price, bargain sound pair of Bluetooth wireless earbuds that are convenient and decent, nothing more and nothing less. They check off the needs and delivers on the quality per price tag. 7/10.

column1: Wireless Earbuds, yobola Bluetoth Earbuds, IPX5 Waterproof Wireless Headphones Touch Control, Bluetoth Headphones 5.1 Built-in Microphone, 25 Hrs with USB-C Charging with Running/Fitness
column3: These earbuds are an excellent value.  They have about 90% of the features of Airpods at an unbelievable price.  I was pleasantly surprised with how nice the build quality was, given how inexpensive these are.  The design is nice and sleek.I bought these to replace my broken Airpods and I've noticed only a couple of minor differences that aren't an issue for me personally:1.  The case does not pair to your phone so you cannot tell exactly how much battery life is left in your case.  The case has an indicator light that flashes when it is below 10% and needs charging.2.  You need to accept phone calls from your earbuds in order for the call to be taken on your earbuds.  If you answer a call on your phone screen, the call will be taken on your phone as well.3.  There are no sensors on the earbuds that automatically start/stop music when your remove/put in the earbuds from your ears.  You need to start/stop manually using the earbud tap functions (I prefer this personally)4.  The tap functions are not programmable like with the Airpods, but all the basic functions you'd expect and need are already there.Overall, these are excellent earbuds for the price.  They're such great value that I bought multiple so I could have one in my office, car, and home.

All the way around they give you plenty of presence at the mids and highs.  They do pick up the lows, but I still desire a little more push from them in that way.  Without going into expensive earbuds or comparing them with in-ear monitors for musicians, these buds offer a surprising quality that is  actually very good... again for this price range.

column3: These earbuds are nothing like airpods. Anyone saying they are must not have a pair of airpods. These earbuds are good for the price but are nowhere near the quality of AirPods. These Ear buds have a completely different feel in the ear, they are not as round and smooth as AirPods and do not swivel in the case for easy removal like AirPods. Sound quality and noise cancellation are much better with AirPods. These earbuds are incredibly sensitive, any bump of your ear bud and it will pause whatever you are listening too. These earbuds randomly connect to my phone when they are no in use making me have to disconnect these earbuds from Bluetooth frequently. Overall these are decent earbuds but nothing near the quality of AirPods.

I was impressed they reached out and wanted to give me a gift, but, then I got an email asking me to delete my review. This is a disgusting manipulative tactic. column1: Wireless Earbuds, yobola Bluetoth Earbuds, IPX5 Waterproof Wireless Headphones Touch Control, Bluetoth Headphones 5.1 Built-in Microphone, 25 Hrs with USB-C Charging with Running/Fitness
column3: Initially I absolutely loved these ear buds.  They fit well and stayed in throughout a variety of activities.  The touch sensor was the only initial complaint as it didn't seem to always respond on a first touch.  However, I've only had this product for a few months and the volume capability of the ear buds began to fade.  It started with the left ear bud being a lot quieter than the other and as I liked to have the option to run one ear bud at a time if desired but even on the highest volume setting and trying all potential software settings, it is barely audible with any type of ambient noise.  Than 2 weeks ago the right ear bud had the same issue.  I have volume turned all the way up and these ear buds just no longer perform.  Something has clearly gone wrong with them and rendered them useless.  I tried to use them on a plane ride the other day and I couldn't hear anything over the ambient noise of the plan in flight.  The product is just not built for the long haul which is disappointing as it had such a promising start at the beginning.

Like low, as if from a cheap Bluetooth speaker. I ask if it’s him. It is.Concerned, my wife puts the earbud in her ear, wondering if he’s hurting his hearing. Nope, it’s a normal, comfortable volume level. And yet we could hear it all when it was in his (or my wife’s ear).So, don’t buy these if you need to keep to yourself what you’re listening to. column1: Wireless Earbuds, yobola Bluetoth Earbuds, IPX5 Waterproof Wireless Headphones Touch Control, Bluetoth Headphones 5.1 Built-in Microphone, 25 Hrs with USB-C Charging with Running/Fitness
column3: I've been a holdout on wireless earbuds for a while now, but I wanted to be able to move around the house while listening to audiobooks on my phone. I had previously bought a different pair for about twice the price but didn't like them because they were bulky and wouldn't stay in my ears. I decided to give these a shot based on the positive reviews and the low price. After using them for a few weeks, I'm really happy with them and so far am glad I didn't spend way more. They fit in my ears pretty well (one side doesn't fit quite as well as the other, but it does stay in for the most part...not sure I'd be comfortable running or doing other intense activities with these in, though). The battery life seems awesome, as I will sometimes listen to these for several hours a day and don't charge the case more than maybe once a week, and I have yet to run the battery down to the point where they're unusable. I don't do the best with all of the various types of taps that perform different functions, but I can pause and play and adjust the volume without any trouble, so these are user-friendly in that regard.

column1: Wireless Earbuds, yobola Bluetoth Earbuds, IPX5 Waterproof Wireless Headphones Touch Control, Bluetoth Headphones 5.1 Built-in Microphone, 25 Hrs with USB-C Charging with Running/Fitness
column3: Hallo zusammen,vorweg möchte ich sagen das die Kritikpunkte eher Meckern auf hohem Niveau sind!Die Kopfhörer lassen sich Recht schnell koppeln und überzeugen mit einem festen Sitz im Alltag, für sportliche Aktivitäten draußen würde ich sie jedoch nicht benutzen. Dafür ist der Sitz nicht gegeben aber das ist auch nicht das hauptsächliche Aufgabengebiet.Für den Preis und den gestellten Anforderungen sind die Kopfhörer prima.Ich benutze sie viel um Musik zu hören im Büro oder um Telefonate abzuwickeln. Zwischenzeitlich auch beim Kunden in Server Umgebung.Die Sprachqualität wurde von meinem gegenüber nicht groß bemängelt. Klar ist aber auch das diese nicht dem entspricht das ein richtiges Headset teils rausholen kann. Wind Geräusche werden rudimentär heraus gerechnet.Die Akku Laufzeit bei täglich circa 4h aktiver Nutzung ist sehr gut. Inklusive dem Ladecase komme ich damit gut 5 Tage aus.Alles in allem bin ich sehr zufrieden, eine funktionierende App wäre noch nice, diese fehlt komplett. Ebenso ist die Handhabung zur Kopplung bei mehreren Endgeräten sehr müßig. Hierfür darf keine BT Verbindung bestehen mit einem gekoppelten Gerät.Die tast Haptik ist super und reagiert konsequent benötigt jedoch am Anfang etwas Hirnschmalz um sich diese zu merken.Ich hoffe ich konnte helfen, bis bald.

column3: Preis Leistung ist gut!Für den angebotenen preis sind es gute Kopfhörer. Das Paring funktioniert tadellos. Die Reichweite ist ausreichend und auch die Akkulaufzeit ist vollkommen in Ordnung. Dafür kann der Hersteller des Produkts natürlich nichts, Ohren sind ja bekanntlich so individuell wie der Fingerabdruck des Menschen.Das es Abstriche zu hochpreisigen Kopfhörer Alternativen gibt sollte klar sein. Der Klang ist insgesamt zwar solide, aber sehr „flach“. Mit diversen Equalizer Einstellungen lässt sich etwas am Gesamtbild herauskitzeln.Verpackung und Versand durch Amazon wie immer tadellos!

column1: Wireless Earbuds, yobola Bluetoth Earbuds, IPX5 Waterproof Wireless Headphones Touch Control, Bluetoth Headphones 5.1 Built-in Microphone, 25 Hrs with USB-C Charging with Running/Fitness
column3: Allora, le cuffie funzionano molto bene. E' la prima volta che acquisto cuffie senza fili e perciò non mi aspettavo nulla di particolare. Il suono non è ottimale con la musica, ma parla una persona che con la musica ci lavora, quindi il mio giudizio è molto molto critico. Per chi come me vuole sentire meglio i bassi (perché con queste cuffie spariscono) può andare su Spotify ad impostazioni > equalizzatore. E li può ridimensionare il suono a suo piacimento. Quindi problema risolto. Per quanto riguarda il volume invece, sì, effettivamente è un po' basso ma io ero abituata ad un altro tipo di cuffie. Ad ogni modo il problema è risolvibile anche in quel caso perché ad alcuni telefoni si può eliminare l'audio predefinito tramite le impostazioni sviluppatore (se cercate tutorial su internet è davvero molto facile), per chi invece come me ha un Redmi Note, la questione si complica perché in alcuni telefoni Xiaomi non c'è questa opzione. Ho risolto in ogni caso (perché non mi do pace se le cose non sono come le voglio io) scaricando un booster che aumenta di un po' il volume delle cuffie.La batteria dura. Va benissimo. Io le uso tutti i giorni per la musica o chiamate. E devo dire che da quando le ho comprate si sono scaricate solo la prima volta (con la batteria di quando le ho tirate fuori per la prima volta, per intenderci, quindi non so quanto fossero state caricate). Per quanto mi riguarda sono abbastanza soddisfatta, nonostante queste accortezze, sarà che è il mio primo acquisto di questo tipo. Le ho comprate per fino a mia madre e ne è contentissima anche lei. Unica grossa pecca che credo non si possa risolvere: quando la batteria sta per esaurirsi, ti avvisa con un segnale sonoro che le cuffie stanno per spegnersi (quando arriva a 10%). Questo suono è ESTREMAMENTE alto, rispetto a tutto il resto e non capisco per quale motivo. Inoltre si ripete dopo un po' di tempo. Quindi ora che ho anche aumentato il volume cerco di ovviare a questo problema, controllando sempre lo stato batteria e cercando di non farla arrivare al 10%.

column3: Die Kopfhörer habe ich dreimal gekauft. Beim ersten Set habe ich leider ein Teil verloren (Maske abgemacht, nachdem ich von der Bahn ausgestiegen bin und das linke Teil ist direkt auf der Bahngleis gefallen!). Danach habe ich noch zwei Sets gekauft, um sicher zu sein, dass ich bei einem weiteren Verlust noch bedient bin. Die Kopfhörer sind klasse. Musik und Telefonieren klingt gut, die Bluetooth Verbindung funktioniert einwandfrei und man kann sie mit einem USB-C Kabel laden. Ich bin total zufrieden und würde sie immer wieder kaufen. Danke!

column1: Wireless Earbuds, yobola Bluetoth Earbuds, IPX5 Waterproof Wireless Headphones Touch Control, Bluetoth Headphones 5.1 Built-in Microphone, 25 Hrs with USB-C Charging with Running/Fitness
column3: A voir sur le long terme : la solidité et la durée de vie des écouteurs et du boîtier.Son plutôt bon au premier essai, utilisation facile donc à voir pour la suite, si des bugs ne surviennent pas avec le boîtier pour charger ou autre.

column1: Wireless Earbuds, yobola Bluetoth Earbuds, IPX5 Waterproof Wireless Headphones Touch Control, Bluetoth Headphones 5.1 Built-in Microphone, 25 Hrs with USB-C Charging with Running/Fitness
column3: acheté pour ma fille, un peu long à se connecter, le son peu aller. ressemblent à des airs pod.

column1: Wireless Earbuds, yobola Bluetoth Earbuds, IPX5 Waterproof Wireless Headphones Touch Control, Bluetoth Headphones 5.1 Built-in Microphone, 25 Hrs with USB-C Charging with Running/Fitness
column3: Produit correspond à mes attentes. Les écouteurs tiennent bien dans les oreilles, La qualité du son est très bonne,très bonne connectiviter ils se connectent en quelques secondes une fois sorties de leur étui,il est possible d'utiliser un seul écouteur à la fois,le boitier est de bonne qualité,La batterie tient aisément les 5h annoncés,ils sont très pratiques et peut cher;Bref c'est un 5/5 pour moi niveau qualité-prix c'est topje suis très content de mon achat et je recommande le produit

column1: Wireless Earbuds, yobola Bluetoth Earbuds, IPX5 Waterproof Wireless Headphones Touch Control, Bluetoth Headphones 5.1 Built-in Microphone, 25 Hrs with USB-C Charging with Running/Fitness
column3: Stavo cercando un paio di cuffie bluetooth e mi sono imbattuto in questo modello proposto da Yobola. Dopo aver letto alcune recensioni mi sono deciso ad acquistarle. Il servizio di Amazon come al solito impeccabile me le ha fatte pervenire velocemente così ho potuto subito provarle. Devo subito dire che sono rimasto piacevolmente sorpreso innanzitutto dalla comodità. Stanno molto bene nelle mie orecchie, non tendono a cadere e non danno alcun fastidio. Passando poi alle telefonate il suono è chiaro. La voce dell'interlocutore si sente molto bene e a quanto pare anche quella del sottoscritto. Dal punto di vista dell'ascolto di musica sono rimasto impressionato dai bassi. Che dire? Per quello che costano rappresentano davvero un'ottima scelta. Brava Yobola!!!

column1: Wireless Earbuds, yobola Bluetoth Earbuds, IPX5 Waterproof Wireless Headphones Touch Control, Bluetoth Headphones 5.1 Built-in Microphone, 25 Hrs with USB-C Charging with Running/Fitness
column3: Ich hab mir die Kopfhörer fürs Gym geholt um Musik zur Motivation zu hören und wollte eigentlich nur was günstiges was möglichst gute Qualität hat. Jedoch hat mich dieses Produkt positiv überrascht, die Qualität von dem Produkt selbst sowie die Klangqualität sind sehr gut meiner Meinung nach für Bluetooth in-ear Kopfhörer sogar besser wie die von JBL. Der Akku hält sich lange, ich habe diese Kopfhörer seit 1 woche und benutze sie aktiv ca 2 Stunde im Gym jeden Tag und ich musste die bis jetzt noch nicht aufladen und optisch sehen sie halt auch schön und qualitativ aus.Fazit: Ich benutze die Kopfhörer sehr gerne und bin sehr zufrieden für den geringen Preis so eine Qualität zu kriegen. Kann ich nur empfehlen!

column1: Wireless Earbuds, yobola Bluetoth Earbuds, IPX5 Waterproof Wireless Headphones Touch Control, Bluetoth Headphones 5.1 Built-in Microphone, 25 Hrs with USB-C Charging with Running/Fitness
column3: First pair of ear buds, find them pretty good.  Sounds seems fine.Only reservation would be lose fit so not sure I would walk about with them in use. Looking forward to using them by the pool on holiday.

column1: Wireless Earbuds, yobola Bluetoth Earbuds, IPX5 Waterproof Wireless Headphones Touch Control, Bluetoth Headphones 5.1 Built-in Microphone, 25 Hrs with USB-C Charging with Running/Fitness
column3: Des écouteurs qui valent le coup. Le son est bon sans être exceptionnel (en même temps il ne faut pas s'attendre à meilleur au vu du prix). Cela reste néanmoins très correct. A voir dans le temps si la batterie dure, c'est ma seule crainte ! Petit bémol pour le maintien dans l'oreille pas toujours évident, difficile d'imaginer faire du sport avec.

column1: Wireless Earbuds, yobola Bluetoth Earbuds, IPX5 Waterproof Wireless Headphones Touch Control, Bluetoth Headphones 5.1 Built-in Microphone, 25 Hrs with USB-C Charging with Running/Fitness
column3: These are my first pair of wireless ear buds, so I can't compare with others. However, once I worked out how to use them they've been a game changer! So much better than the wired ones that snagged a lot. They do have a tendency to fall out if I fiddle with my longish hair, take off a scarf or such like. Apparently they're noise cancelling, but I haven't noticed that and as it happens I wouldn't want it while I'm driving as I still want to be alert to road noise around me.

column1: Wireless Earbuds, yobola Bluetoth Earbuds, IPX5 Waterproof Wireless Headphones Touch Control, Bluetoth Headphones 5.1 Built-in Microphone, 25 Hrs with USB-C Charging with Running/Fitness
column3: Très satisfaite de mon achat . Bonnes qualité de son et d'automie de la batterie . Petit boîtier pratique . Tient relativement bien dans l'oreille (pas testé pour le sport )

column1: Wireless Earbuds, yobola Bluetoth Earbuds, IPX5 Waterproof Wireless Headphones Touch Control, Bluetoth Headphones 5.1 Built-in Microphone, 25 Hrs with USB-C Charging with Running/Fitness
column3: Très bon rapport qualité prix. Robuste, sont tombés par terre et ne sont pas cassés. Agréable à porter. Tient relativement bien dans les oreilles. Mais je déconseille pour les sportifs. Marcher, c'est ok. Courir, pas sûr !

column1: Wireless Earbuds, yobola Bluetoth Earbuds, IPX5 Waterproof Wireless Headphones Touch Control, Bluetoth Headphones 5.1 Built-in Microphone, 25 Hrs with USB-C Charging with Running/Fitness
column3: Produit correspond à mes attentes. La qualité du son est très bonne, les écouteurs se connectent en quelques secondes une fois sortis de leur étui. On peu mettre un seul écouteur et laisser l'autre en charge se qui est pratique si on veut rester attentif aux bruits externes.La batterie tient facilement les 5h annoncées par charge tout comme les 5 cycles avant d'avoir besoin d'une prise. La prise USB-C est un plus à l'heure où tous les appareils sont sous ce format, qui permet de recharger avec n'importe prise sous la main.

column1: Wireless Earbuds, yobola Bluetoth Earbuds, IPX5 Waterproof Wireless Headphones Touch Control, Bluetoth Headphones 5.1 Built-in Microphone, 25 Hrs with USB-C Charging with Running/Fitness
column3: Écouteurs intra auriculaire de bonne qualité.  Très agréable à porter. Les écouteurs tiennent bien sans ressentir cette gêne des oreilles bouchers.  Les appels sont audibles et s'est un grand plus. Les basses sont bonnes. Seul bémol elles tiennent pas très bien la charge.

column1: Wireless Earbuds, yobola Bluetoth Earbuds, IPX5 Waterproof Wireless Headphones Touch Control, Bluetoth Headphones 5.1 Built-in Microphone, 25 Hrs with USB-C Charging with Running/Fitness
column3: Reçu rapidement et bien emballé.Très bon son des écouteurs au vu du prix. Ils tiennent bien à l'oreille, seul bémol quand on court, on entend le vent. Ça ne fait qu'un mois que je les ai mais j'aime beaucoup

column1: Wireless Earbuds, yobola Bluetoth Earbuds, IPX5 Waterproof Wireless Headphones Touch Control, Bluetoth Headphones 5.1 Built-in Microphone, 25 Hrs with USB-C Charging with Running/Fitness
column3: These headphones are really good and worth the money. The sound quality is excellent and they has really long play time. Mine go days without having to charge them. The charging case is small, almost like real AirPods. Headphones are good at noise cancellation. The headphones come with a charger which you can use to plug into any laptop computer etc. Also the headphones have a Button to tap and pause the music for and they work in long range even if the device you are playing the music on is at a far distance from you. Really recommend getting these headphones as they are worth the money

column1: Wireless Earbuds, yobola Bluetoth Earbuds, IPX5 Waterproof Wireless Headphones Touch Control, Bluetoth Headphones 5.1 Built-in Microphone, 25 Hrs with USB-C Charging with Running/Fitness
column3: Conforme à mes attentes pour le prix

column1: Wireless Earbuds, yobola Bluetoth Earbuds, IPX5 Waterproof Wireless Headphones Touch Control, Bluetoth Headphones 5.1 Built-in Microphone, 25 Hrs with USB-C Charging with Running/Fitness
column3: Le son est de bonne qualité et les écouteurs ont une bonne autonomie.

column1: Wireless Earbuds, yobola Bluetoth Earbuds, IPX5 Waterproof Wireless Headphones Touch Control, Bluetoth Headphones 5.1 Built-in Microphone, 25 Hrs with USB-C Charging with Running/Fitness
column3: J'ai acheté ces écouteurs pour ma fille qui a 16 ans . Elle les utilise quand elle marche à pied pour rentrer à notre domicile et quand elle fait du sport et elle en est très satisfaite ! Elle les trouve très confortables , la qualité du son est très bonne et l'autonomie est pratique.Bref, un très bon produit à un prix vraiment raisonnable . Je recommande.

column1: Wireless Earbuds, yobola Bluetoth Earbuds, IPX5 Waterproof Wireless Headphones Touch Control, Bluetoth Headphones 5.1 Built-in Microphone, 25 Hrs with USB-C Charging with Running/Fitness

Ils s'adaptent parfaitement aux oreilles.Un excellent rapport qualité / prix.J'adhère entièrement et je serai prête a les recommander.

column3: Los auriculares están muy bien, estéticamente elegantes, con instrucciones muy fáciles de entender y un funcionamiento muy intuitivo.La calidad de sonido es muy aceptable y nítida en sus diferentes rangos y la batería dura bastante sin recargar.Son cómodos de llevar y de usar, al menos para mi su tamaño se adapta correctamente y la conexión con el teléfono es automática cuando los sacas de la caja.Muy buena calidad de llamada también al usarlos para hablar por teléfono tanto en interior como por la calle.¡Recomendables!

column1: Wireless Earbuds, yobola Bluetoth Earbuds, IPX5 Waterproof Wireless Headphones Touch Control, Bluetoth Headphones 5.1 Built-in Microphone, 25 Hrs with USB-C Charging with Running/Fitness

column3: Buon prodotto,fanno discretamente il loro dovere.Le uso per lavoro,a volte anche in motorino,devo dire che mi sono trovato davvero bene e sono pienamente soddisfatto.Logicamente,non si possono paragonare ai top di gamma;ma sono un’ottima alternativa.

column1: Wireless Earbuds, yobola Bluetoth Earbuds, IPX5 Waterproof Wireless Headphones Touch Control, Bluetoth Headphones 5.1 Built-in Microphone, 25 Hrs with USB-C Charging with Running/Fitness

column1: Wireless Earbuds, yobola Bluetoth Earbuds, IPX5 Waterproof Wireless Headphones Touch Control, Bluetoth Headphones 5.1 Built-in Microphone, 25 Hrs with USB-C Charging with Running/Fitness
column3: Ero scettica essendo abituata a usare le cuffie e non gli auricolari, ma per l’estate mi sono convinta ad acquistare le yobola T9 e sono rimasta piacevolmente sorpresa. La qualità del suono è buona (si perdono un po’ i bassi) e non ci sono grossi problemi con le telefonate soprattutto in assenza di forti rumori di sottofondo.Rapporto qualità-prezzo ottimo, la batteria dura a lungo.

column1: Wireless Earbuds, yobola Bluetoth Earbuds, IPX5 Waterproof Wireless Headphones Touch Control, Bluetoth Headphones 5.1 Built-in Microphone, 25 Hrs with USB-C Charging with Running/Fitness
column3: Offert à mon papa qui ne supporte pas les gros casques et encore moins les écouteurs avec fil. Il en est très satisfait, ces écouteurs font le job pour lui qui les voulait surtout pour écouter de la musique ou regarder ses émissions sans déranger autrui.Ils se chargent bien et pour longtemps, ils sont très simples d'utilisation.Bémol : ils ont tendance à glisser des petites oreilles et quand on veut les repositionner on a tendance à toucher le bouton de contrôle et à couper le son.

column1: Wireless Earbuds, yobola Bluetoth Earbuds, IPX5 Waterproof Wireless Headphones Touch Control, Bluetoth Headphones 5.1 Built-in Microphone, 25 Hrs with USB-C Charging with Running/Fitness
column3: Ho acquistato queste cuffie bluetooth un paio di mesi fa, stanca delle classiche cuffie con il filo, e da allora le ho utilizzate regolarmente. Principalmente, dato che amo ascoltare musica, cercavo una qualità del suono che mi soddisfacesse in maniera più che sufficiente. E devo dire che sono molto soddisfatta. Ottime anche in chiamata e ottima anche la durata della batteria. Nonostante le usi ininterrottamente, anche per ore, non ho bisogno di ricaricarle frequentemente. Si ricaricano come un qualsiasi smartphone e la durata della carica è abbastanza rapida. In circa un'ora sono nuovamente pronte all'uso. Ottimo rapporto qualità/prezzo. Consigliate.

column1: Wireless Earbuds, yobola Bluetoth Earbuds, IPX5 Waterproof Wireless Headphones Touch Control, Bluetoth Headphones 5.1 Built-in Microphone, 25 Hrs with USB-C Charging with Running/Fitness
column3: Ich möchte hiermit einmal ein Lob an Yobola aussprechen, da die T9 ein wahres Wunder sind!Da mein Hund vor Kurzem mein altes Handy Headset leider zerknabbert hat, war ich auf der Suche nach einer Alternative.Beim Durchstöbern von Amazon bin ich auf die Yobola T9 aufmerksam geworden.Im ersten Moment hatte ich nicht viel Hoffnung, da die Kopfhörer sehr günstig sind, jedoch überhaupt nicht billig verarbeitet.Nach Erhalt der Ware und ein paar ersten Tests bin ich vollkommen Positiv überrascht, wie laut und gut die Qualität der Kopfhörer sind,/ist.Ein Mängel der Kopfhörer ist das Mikrofon, es könnte qualitativ besser sein, aber durch den Preis immer noch vollkommen ausreichend.

column1: Wireless Earbuds, yobola Bluetoth Earbuds, IPX5 Waterproof Wireless Headphones Touch Control, Bluetoth Headphones 5.1 Built-in Microphone, 25 Hrs with USB-C Charging with Running/Fitness
column3: Top je recommande ses écouteurs sans problème  !

column1: Wireless Earbuds, yobola Bluetoth Earbuds, IPX5 Waterproof Wireless Headphones Touch Control, Bluetoth Headphones 5.1 Built-in Microphone, 25 Hrs with USB-C Charging with Running/Fitness
column3: Les écouteurs tiennent bien même durant l’activité physiquePar contre on entends un peu le bruit extérieur même en mettant le volume à fond.

column1: Wireless Earbuds, yobola Bluetoth Earbuds, IPX5 Waterproof Wireless Headphones Touch Control, Bluetoth Headphones 5.1 Built-in Microphone, 25 Hrs with USB-C Charging with Running/Fitness
column3: Had these a while now , they've stood strong on 3 holiday, get dropped at work all the time they don't scuff.I feel like what I use them for they don't get charge at all .For day to day use , there the best .I'd image if you had a really  expensive  pair but I'd be to scared to loose them .With these you get more than you pay for 👍

column1: Wireless Earbuds, yobola Bluetoth Earbuds, IPX5 Waterproof Wireless Headphones Touch Control, Bluetoth Headphones 5.1 Built-in Microphone, 25 Hrs with USB-C Charging with Running/Fitness
column3: Je suis agréablement surpris par la qualité de son et le confort de ces écouteurs. A la base, je les ai pris pour mes enfants afin qu'elles puissent regarder des films sur la tablette lors des voyages. Convient aux enfants comme aux adultes, les écouteurs ne bougent pas. Pas de coupures en écouteurs partagés. Le boîtier est très compact et on ne le sens pas dans une poche. Pour comparer, j'ai des Huawei freebuds pro depuis maintenant un an. Ce sont des intras et le son est plus étouffés sans pour autant étre plus puissant que les yobola. Les yobolas ont un son plus clair et des basses aussi prononcés que sur les Huawei. En résumé je trouve les yobola meilleurs, c'est dire... Je ne supportais plus les intras qui rentrent dans les oreilles et sont inconfortables au bout d'1h, ici c'est une délivrance pour un son aussi bon. Bien sûr j'ai moins de fonctionnalités que sur les Huawei mais ce n'est pas le même prix. Je pense les revendre pour me reprendre une paire de yobola.. Me reste plus qu'à tester l'autonomie, mais 5h à volume modéré, c'est la moyenne à l'heure actuelle. Je recommande vivement, vous ne serez pas déçu.

column1: Wireless Earbuds, yobola Bluetoth Earbuds, IPX5 Waterproof Wireless Headphones Touch Control, Bluetoth Headphones 5.1 Built-in Microphone, 25 Hrs with USB-C Charging with Running/Fitness
column3: Très satisfaiteIl est important de procéder à une charge complète des écouteurs avant l installation sur le téléphone sinon on peut croire qu ils ne fonctionnent pas alors qu' il faut juste bien les charger avantAcheté pour ma fille pour se rendre au lycée elle a déjà des écouteurs d une marque connue et elle trouve ces écouteurs très performant avec une qualité équivalente à cette grande marque

column1: Wireless Earbuds, yobola Bluetoth Earbuds, IPX5 Waterproof Wireless Headphones Touch Control, Bluetoth Headphones 5.1 Built-in Microphone, 25 Hrs with USB-C Charging with Running/Fitness
column3: Bastante buen sonido para el precio que tienen, si los tienes puestos en un lugar sin ruido exterior meten un poco de ruido (sin escuchar nada). Son táctiles para ponerlos en pausa, con un poco de retardo de medio segundo o así para funcionar. Aun así estoy bastante contento porque por 20 euros no se puede pedir más y suenan muy bien.

column1: Wireless Earbuds, yobola Bluetoth Earbuds, IPX5 Waterproof Wireless Headphones Touch Control, Bluetoth Headphones 5.1 Built-in Microphone, 25 Hrs with USB-C Charging with Running/Fitness
column3: Évidemment la qualité va avec le prix. Le plastique du boitier est très léger comme si c’était un jouet mais sinon les écouteurs fonctionnent comme il faut. Qualité du son tout à fait potable.

column3: Ecouteurs sans fil de très bonne qualité.Très bon son.Tient très bien la charge.Rapport qualité prix top !

column3: Écouteurs qui ont parfaitement convenu à ma belle-mère pour des appels et regarder des films avec ses écouteurs. Ils tiennent très  bien à l’oreille.

column1: Wireless Earbuds, yobola Bluetoth Earbuds, IPX5 Waterproof Wireless Headphones Touch Control, Bluetoth Headphones 5.1 Built-in Microphone, 25 Hrs with USB-C Charging with Running/Fitness
column3: Conforme et pas très cher. Bon son et bon réseau Bluetooth. Par contre, les écouteurs tiennent mal dans les oreilles. On peut donc difficilement les garder pendant une activité physique.

column1: Wireless Earbuds, yobola Bluetoth Earbuds, IPX5 Waterproof Wireless Headphones Touch Control, Bluetoth Headphones 5.1 Built-in Microphone, 25 Hrs with USB-C Charging with Running/Fitness
column3: Die Kopfhörer kamen sehr gut verpackt und schnell bei mir an. Mit der Bewertung habe ich jetzt ein paar Monate gewartet, weil allzu oft die günstigen Geräte zunächst funktionieren aber dann sehr schnell kaputt gehen. Bei diesen Kopfhöhrern ist das aber nicht der Fall. Es gibt nichts zu mecken. Klang ist gut, Ergonomie ist gut, Akku-Laufzeit ist top, Kopplung mit dem Smartphone funktioniert einwandfrei und auch die Verbindung bleibt stabil. Ich würde das Gerät jederzeit wieder kaufen. Haben wir auch gemacht. Drei Geräte insgesamt. Kann ich ohne Bedenken empfehlen.

column1: Wireless Earbuds, yobola Bluetoth Earbuds, IPX5 Waterproof Wireless Headphones Touch Control, Bluetoth Headphones 5.1 Built-in Microphone, 25 Hrs with USB-C Charging with Running/Fitness
column3: Ive been using these for work and theyre great in that the battery lasts long, i can hear almost everything and they are light. But i have to be next to my phone because if i go downstairs they wont reach.

column3: In der Preis-Leistung hat mich dieses Produkt wirklich überzeugt.Die Bluetooth Verbindung hat bis jetzt immer problemlos funktioniert. column3: Le cuffie tre sono ottime, la misura è perfetta per chia ha un orecchio medio-piccolo l’audio è impeccabile, si sente benissimo ottimi i bassi nessun rumore di sottofondo. Si connettono all’istante automaticamente, non le carico per settimane e la regolazione (alzare/abbassare il volume, cambiare canzone ecc, con le cuffie) funziona efficientemente ed è molto comoda. Unico difetto che mi sembra aver riscontrato è il microfono. Non isolano bene dai rumori esterni (es. vento)  e l’altra persona, in chiamata, sente la mia voce ad un volume un po’ più basso a causa delle cuffie. Nulla di esageratamente grave, si riesce comunque a parlare al telefono. Il rapporto qualità prezzo è giustissimo le consiglio assolutamente.

column1: Wireless Earbuds, yobola Bluetoth Earbuds, IPX5 Waterproof Wireless Headphones Touch Control, Bluetoth Headphones 5.1 Built-in Microphone, 25 Hrs with USB-C Charging with Running/Fitness
column3: Fazit: Gute Kopfhörer für kleines GeldHinweis: Der Hersteller hat um Rezension gebeten und verspricht dafür einen Gutschein. Er hat aber keine Vorgabe zur Wertung gemacht (ob er‘s tut und täte, insbesondere bei schlechter Wertung, sei mal dahingestellt). Ich finde die Kopfhörer gut, bin aber im Allgemeinen zu faul, etwas zu schreiben, hier wurde ich motiviert. 😉Auf der Suche nach kabellosen Kopfhörern für meine Mutter, die gern auf dem iPad mal ein Video oder ein bisschen Musik hört, die meinen Vater weniger interessieren, hab ich dieses Paar ausgewählt.Voraussetzungen:Es sollten nicht die teuren Dinger sein…Wichtig war mir, dass das iPad merkt, wenn der Kopfhörer im Case gelandet ist und automatisch die Wiedergabe stoppt und dann beim weiteren Wiedergabestart auf die Lautsprecher umschaltet (das klappte leider nicht bei den Soundpeats, die ich ansonsten super fand, aber die muss man halt am Kopfhörer ausschalten - kann man mal vergessen oder man tippt zu viel und Zack, sagt das iPad auf einmal nichts mehr, weil es nicht vorhandene Kopfhörer versorgt… da führt ggf. zu Verwirrung, wollte ich nicht). Die Hörer werden beim nächsten Auspacken trotzdem wieder automatisch gekoppelt und es kann ohne Umweg über das Menü weitergehen.Außerdem sollte es nicht aus Versehen zum Aktivieren des Sprachassistenten kommen. Hier braucht es dreimal Tippen. Das passt also für mich auch.Ansonsten:Die Verpackung, in der Kopfhörer und Case zusammen mit Kabel und Bedienungsanleitung ankommen, ist nett, die Kopfhörer sind außerhalb des Ladekästchens in anthrazitfarbenem Schaumstoff. Quadratisches, schlichtes Kästchen, das so gut schließt, dass man es nur für Dinge weiterverwenden sollte, an die man nicht oft dran muss. 😉Super ist die mehrsprachige Bedienungsanleitung. Kurzes Ladekabel (USB) ist dabei, Case war teilgeladen, Kopfhörer brauchten zum Aufladen einen Moment (geht aber schnell - zum Ausprobieren sowieso).Ich benötige keine App (bekomme aber auch keine, ggf. muss man Einstellungen am Synthesizer des Telefons vornehmen). Ein helles Ding-Dong beim Koppeln - nicht zu laut (ist bei anderen z.T. unangenehm), keine Stimme, die irgendwas auf Chinesisch oder Englisch sagt oder gar „brüllt“.Die Kopfhörer sind etwas gedrungener als die AirPods (zum Vergleich rechts im Bild). Ansonsten ist die Größe recht ähnlich. Die Kopfhörer selbst sind nicht ganz glatt, sondern in einer leicht rauen Oberfläche (wie dickes Papier anmutend) gefertigt, nur der Teil, der am Ohr direkt anliegt ist ganz glatt. Ich persönlich mag eine glatte Oberfläche eigentlich lieber, stören tut die andere nicht, scheint auch kein Schmutzfänger zu sein. Ich habe sehr kleine Ohren (bzw. Eingänge zum Hörkanal) und kann die Kopfhörer minimal schlechter im Ohr vertragen als die weniger dicke Version von Apple, aber sie sind trotzdem noch ok. Meine Mutter meinte, dass sie die Dinger manchmal regelrecht vergisst, weil sie so leicht und gut sitzen.Das Case ist deutlich leichter und fühlt sich (dadurch?) dünner und weniger wertig an als das der AirPods - ich würde es nicht in der Tasche unter einer Konservendose landen sehen wollen, aber ansonsten bedeutet das einfach auch weniger Geschleppe, was ich nicht verkehrt finde… Oberfläche ebenfalls leicht rau. Die magnetische Halterung der Hörer ist nicht zu stark und nicht zu schwach, aufladen klappt anstandslos.Der Sound ist prima. Keine Wunder erwarten, aber für Pop und TV völlig ok. Bass und Höhen ausgewogen. Lautstärke hab ich nicht ausreizen können, spiele auf niedriger Lautstärke ohne Probleme (wobei ich gut höre). Man kann die Hörer auch einzeln benutzen.Die Bedienung: Wo mir bei Apple immer noch ein paar Befehle fehlen, hier ist alles dabei. Einmal tippen, lang halten, zwei- bzw. dreimal Tippen. Das sind potentiell acht Befehle , da geht viel, wenn auch nicht alles einfach oder perfekt. Wenn man lange Haare hat und in der Nähe des Ohres wischt, kann das schon mal Effekte zeitigen, die nicht gewünscht sind, das sollte man bedenken.Telefonieren funktioniert. Ich höre den Gesprächspartner sehr gut, auf der anderen Seite komme ich etwas leiser als direkt am Telefon an (hängt sicher z.T. damit zusammen, wie gut die Mikros zum Mund ausgerichtet sind), etwas Hall, insgesamt aber völlig ok (nur in ruhiger Umgebung getestet).Ich liebe meine AirPods und werde wohl nicht wechseln... Wenn man bei diesen Kopfhörern mit einem Tipp keine Aktion auslösen würde, wäre mir das lieber. Diese Alternative von yobola ist aber sooo viel günstiger, dass ich sie vom Preis-Leistungsverhältnis nur empfehlen kann.

column3: Queste cuffie wireless le sto usando ormai da un paio di mesi, esteticamente quasi uguali alle Earpods, sono prodotte con materiali ottimi e resistenti. Il vano per riporle è resistente e si chiude a scatto, oltre ad avere la chiusura stessa magnetizzata. Connessione ultra veloce tramite Bluetooth con qualsiasi device, suono in chiamata chiaro e cristallino, musica con bassi calibrati e corposi, con comandi touch direttamente sulla cuffietta. Batteria veramente ottima, durano svariate ore sia in conversazione che in riproduzione di contenuti interattivi. Mi sento in definitiva di consigliarle veramente a tutti, dato anche il prezzo esiguo :)

column1: Wireless Earbuds, yobola Bluetoth Earbuds, IPX5 Waterproof Wireless Headphones Touch Control, Bluetoth Headphones 5.1 Built-in Microphone, 25 Hrs with USB-C Charging with Running/Fitness
column3: I bought these earbuds to use when playing games on my phone using my Razer Kishi joypad and for listening to music when out walking or running.I prefer this shape of earbud as ones with silicone buds fall out when moving no matter which size bud I use. They are a similar shape to the Apple ones my sons have but I didn't want to pay as much. For less than a quarter of the price they do the job well.They were not bought for noise cancelling but I prefer to be able to hear some around me when I'm outside so I'm aware of my surroundings to keep me safe. Other reviews mention sound level being too quiet but a quick search on YouTube will show how to put your phone in developer mode as it's the phone that sets the maximum volume limit. I've no issues with the bass and treble the earbuds provide. They retain their charge well too.All things summed up, I'd recommend these earbuds as an alternative to more expensive ones. They are comfortable, sound great and come in a range of colours.

column1: Wireless Earbuds, yobola Bluetoth Earbuds, IPX5 Waterproof Wireless Headphones Touch Control, Bluetoth Headphones 5.1 Built-in Microphone, 25 Hrs with USB-C Charging with Running/Fitness
column3: In dem Lieferumfang, neben dem eigentlichen Gerät, befindet sich das Ladekabel und ein eigenes separates USB Ladegerät. Das betone ich, weil dieses selbst in der billigsten Variante acht Euro kostet. Zieht man dies von dem Kaufpreis ab, so hat man einen guten in Ear Kopfhörer für 21 €. Zu dem Gerät selbst: ich bin mit diesem Gerät nun in den Urlaub gefahren und habe – wie es sich gehört – das Ladekabel vergessen. Trotzdem konnte ich ohne klangverlust weit über 12 Stunden Videos und Musik hören ohne dass das Gerät entladen war. In der Klangqualität oder Tonqualität habe ich ein Punkt abgezogen, da bei der Nutzung sich die Lautstärke reduziert hat gegenüber dem hören über das Musik beziehungsweise Stream Gerät. Die lange Laufzeit ist es sehr gut.  Die Kopfhörer halten sich stabil im Ohr und fallen. Ichs beim ersten berühren aus dem Ohr. Ebenfalls gut ist die Spielerei des akustischen Signals; sobald man den Kopfhörer in seine passende Form steckt, erhält man einen Signalton, das dieser richtig drinnen ist. Ein Problem stellt das Ladekabel dar. Es hat eine eigene Größe und testet man oft das falsche Ladesteckteil, um das richtige Ladekabel dann einzustecken. Dies wird dazu führen, dass die Ladebuchse ausgeleiert wird.Da man jedoch für Markenprodukte von in Ear Kopfhörer gut 200 € investiert, hat man mit diesem Gerät ein sehr gutes Preis-Leistungs-Verhältnis.

column1: Wireless Earbuds, yobola Bluetoth Earbuds, IPX5 Waterproof Wireless Headphones Touch Control, Bluetoth Headphones 5.1 Built-in Microphone, 25 Hrs with USB-C Charging with Running/Fitness
column3: Was dubious about getting wireless headphones because so many people had told me they always break/people can never hear them on the phone/expensive so I thought I’d test it out with a pair of fairly cheap ones.They look similar to the apple air pods, they’re light, don’t really feel them in my ears once in.People can hear me fine on the phone and the battery life is really good. I use them everyday for at least an hour and I haven’t charged the case yet (bought them early June 2022).The sound quality isn’t great, not a huge amount of bass but the mids/treble are very clear. However they’re fine to use for your commute, casual music/podcast listening etc. The volume is fine, not quiet which I thought they might be. I wouldn’t say they’re noise cancelling but I wasn’t expecting them to be as they’re not over the ear cans with padding to isolate the noise.They are small and light so I’ve flung one across the room by accident when taking a jumper off because I forgot I had them in so I can imagine they’re easy to lose (but that’s not a fault of the manufacturer) however I have constant porridge brain and I’ve not lost them yet!!They pair to your phone/ipad/laptop as soon as you take them out of the charger pouch (post setup) and doesn’t call for a mad set up time.Overall VERY happy with my earphones, would definitely recommend to anyone wanting to dip their toe in the wireless headphone pool!

column1: Wireless Earbuds, yobola Bluetoth Earbuds, IPX5 Waterproof Wireless Headphones Touch Control, Bluetoth Headphones 5.1 Built-in Microphone, 25 Hrs with USB-C Charging with Running/Fitness

Je m’explique, si vous avez utilisé  vos écouteurs pour votre tablette et que vous souhaitez les utiliser pour votre téléphone. Il faudra d’abord désactiver le Bluetooth de votre tablette pour permettre à vos écouteurs de se connecter à votre téléphone, ce qui peut être fastidieux parfois. column1: Wireless Earbuds, yobola Bluetoth Earbuds, IPX5 Waterproof Wireless Headphones Touch Control, Bluetoth Headphones 5.1 Built-in Microphone, 25 Hrs with USB-C Charging with Running/Fitness
column3: Llevaba tiempo buscando unos auriculares que sonasen decente y que no requiriesen dejar un riñón en prenda. Soy usuario de Apple Airpods, aburrido ya después del segundo par que compro y acabando con problemas de batería. Me niego a seguir gastándome 120 euros cada vez que a apple le da la gana.Estos suenan “casi” como los airpods, pero comparando con otros auriculares en el mismo rango de precio, el sonido es directamente de otra galaxia.Todos los que he probado en el rango de precios de 20-30 euros son una castaña de cuidado, con sonido metálico, solo con medios, agudos estridentes y graves ausentes.Estos tienen unos agudos cristalinos, unos medios nivelados y unos graves profundos (aunque repito que no llegan al sonido de unos airpods).Si los quieres usar para hablar por teléfono, también dan el callo, y a ti te escucharán también muy bien.Los tengo hace un día, así que no opino sobre duración de batería ni longevidad. Pero si duran aunque sea un año, lo doy por bien invertido.

column1: Wireless Earbuds, yobola Bluetoth Earbuds, IPX5 Waterproof Wireless Headphones Touch Control, Bluetoth Headphones 5.1 Built-in Microphone, 25 Hrs with USB-C Charging with Running/Fitness
column3: Ich war auf der Suche nach kabellosen Kopfhörern, welche ähnlich der originalen Standard IPhone Kopfhörer sind und keine In-Ear-Kopfhörer sind.Diese Kopfhörer verwende ich jetzt schon ca. 2 Monate lang und ich bin sehr positiv überrascht.Ich verwende sie hauptsächlich beim Joggen und bis jetzt hatte ich noch nie das Gefühl, als würde ich sie beim nächsten Schritt verlieren.Sie sitzen sehr fest, drücken aber auch nicht, sodass man sie relativ lange im Ohr lassen kann.Das Pairing mit meinem IPhone SE2 verlief ohne Probleme.Bluetooth eingeschalten, Kopfhörer aus dem Case genommen und schon kann man sie verbinden (man benötigt keine zusätzliche App für ev. Einstellungen).Sobald die Verbindung aufgebaut wurde, hört man einen kurzen Signalton in den Kopfhörern und dann kann man schon die Musik hören/starten.Sobald man die Kopfhörer wieder ins Case zurück gibt, wird die Verbindung zum Handy getrennt und sie werden neu geladen. Dazu blinkt eine Leuchte auf dem Case. Beim Einsetzen in das Case muss man aber darauf achten, welche der rechte und welcher der linke Kopfhörer ist (ist aber gut erkennbar beschriftet auf den Kopfhörern und im Case).Zur Akkuleistung von den Kopfhörern kann ich noch relativ wenig sagen. Ich habe das Case erst zweimal aufgeladen (das erste mal war gleich nach Erhalt), aber die Kopfhörer waren noch nie komplett leer.Zum Laden des Cases kann jedes USB-C-Ladekabel verwendet werden (Es ist aber auch eines beim Produkt dabei). Wenn das Case komplett geladen ist, leuchtet ein grünes Licht auf.Die Tonqualität ist wirklich gut. Man hat durchgehend eine gleichbleibende Qualität und Lautstärke.Telefonate habe ich mit den Kopfhörern noch nicht getestet.Man kann auch nur einen der Kopfhörer aus dem Case nehmen und nur diesen mit dem Smartphone koppeln.Fazit: Klare Kaufempfehlung für diesen Preis (ca. € 25,-) und geeignet fürs Joggen.

Haben danach JBL für 150 Euro ausprobiert, der Klang natürlich vielfach besser aber letztendlich Pries Leistungsverhältnis nicht überzeugend. Sind jetzt bei Oppo Enco Air 2 Pro gelandet, zum halben Preis von JBL klingen sie nicht schlechter, wenn nicht sogar etwas besser, rauschen nicht und sitzen perfekt in den Ohren. Man soll sich also schon überlegen ob einer mit 30 Euro kopfhörer glücklich wird. Ich gebe doch 4 Sterne da es jedem klar sein muss, daß bei dem Preis keine audiophile Erlebnisse zu erwarten sind. Ansonsten war die Verarbeitung ok, Bluetooth Verbindung am iPhone problemlos, tragekomfort gut.

column1: Wireless Earbuds, yobola Bluetoth Earbuds, IPX5 Waterproof Wireless Headphones Touch Control, Bluetoth Headphones 5.1 Built-in Microphone, 25 Hrs with USB-C Charging with Running/Fitness
column3: For the price, they're not bad. Comfortable to wear and affordable.Touch controls are very responsive and the connectivity is pretty good too. Once paired for the first time, the buds connect to my phone as soon as they're out of their charging case and disconnect again once they're put back without any intervention. The only negative aspect I found with these are a lack of clarity on the high frequencies and an overemphasis on the bass which give them a pretty unbalanced sound. This can be remedied somewhat by using third party eq apps but it's not a fantastic solution. Was hoping these would have a flatter frequency response but this is probably a bit much to ask for the price.

column1: Wireless Earbuds, yobola Bluetoth Earbuds, IPX5 Waterproof Wireless Headphones Touch Control, Bluetoth Headphones 5.1 Built-in Microphone, 25 Hrs with USB-C Charging with Running/Fitness
Wireless Earbuds, yobola Bluetoth Earbuds, IPX5 Waterproof Wireless Headphones Touch Control, Bluetoth Headphones 5.1 Built-in Microphone, 25 Hrs with USB-C Charging with Running/Fitness
column3: Je souhaitais des écouteurs sans fil mais sans mettre le prix des AirPods . Je ne m’attendais pas non plus à une équivalence avec ces écouteurs mais c’est plutôt une bonne surprise au vu du prix : franchement les matériaux utilisés sont plutôt de bonne facture (plastique) , le boîtier et les écouteurs sont bien finis. Le packaging ressemble de toutes façons à la marque à la pomme ce qui est loin de décevoir. Très simple de pris en main,  la connexion avec le téléphone est immédiate et se fait sans problème . La qualité du son n’est pas transcendante mais ça reste acceptable. Avec la promo il faut se dire que ça coûte 3 à 4 x moins cher que les originaux… le confort dans les oreilles est très bon , pas de gêne. Globalement très satisfait , ça reste des écouteurs d’un rapport qualité prix plus qu’intéressant,  je n’ai pas encore testé la tenue de la charge , à voir… a vérifier aussi les quelques déconnexion Bluetooth constatées (problème de l’application ou du réseau ), pas très méchant .

column1: Wireless Earbuds, yobola Bluetoth Earbuds, IPX5 Waterproof Wireless Headphones Touch Control, Bluetoth Headphones 5.1 Built-in Microphone, 25 Hrs with USB-C Charging with Running/Fitness
column3: In der Vergangenheit hatte ich einen hohen Verschleiß an kabelgebundenen InEars da immer wieder die dünnen Kabel brachen - nunmehr der erste Versuch mit diesen Wireless.Tonqualität:Die Tonqualität ist vollkommen ok, kein absoluter Genuss aber vollkommen ausreichend für Telefonate und Musik.Mikro:Auch das Mikro macht einen guten Eindruck und bislang gab es bei meinen Anrufpartnern keine Beschwerden.Passform:Am Anfang haben sie noch leicht gedrückt, ein Silikonoverlay wäre perfekt. Aber auch so sitzen die Kopfhörer gut und fallen nicht raus.Akku:Der integrierte Akku hält sehr lange und Dank des Akkus in der Box können diese auch unterwegs geladen werden - absolut empfehlenswert.Koppeln via Bluetooth:Beim ersten Koppeln gelang dies zwar aber es kam immer nur Ton aus einem der Beiden. Dann musste man immer über die Medienausgabe beide T9 bestätigen, aber nach nochmaligem Koppeln klappt es nunmehr perfekt und ohne Probleme.Fazit:Ich bin bislang sehr zufrieden und nutze die Kopfhörer fast täglich auf Arbeit, beim Sport oder der Gartenarbeit. Die Tonqualität ist für den Preis vollkommen ok und die Außengeräusche werden gut gedämpft.

Things have clearly moved on, because for £20 these work perfectly, fit my ear flawlessly (yes, even on a run) and look great. Slight niggles - 1/ I took a call when in a slightly noisy shopping centre and the recipient couldn’t hear me until I took the bud from my ear and held it to my mouth 2/ the touch control is very sensitive - just something to be aware of.Overall, amazing for the price

column1: Wireless Earbuds, yobola Bluetoth Earbuds, IPX5 Waterproof Wireless Headphones Touch Control, Bluetoth Headphones 5.1 Built-in Microphone, 25 Hrs with USB-C Charging with Running/Fitness
column3: ... die Bluetooth-Verbindung lässt einiges an Luft nach oben zu!Als Smartphone liegt ein Mate9 vor, mit dem auch ein Sony WH-1000XM4 wunderbar läuft. Es geht hier um die Verbindungsstabilität der Bluetooth Verbindung. Da der Sony Kopfhörer wunderbar läuft, auch wenn zwischen dem Kopfhörer und dem Smartphone ca 5-10 Meter inkl. Sichttrennung liegt,ist es bei diesem Kopfhörer alles andere als schön. Schon alleine das Handy in der hinteren Hosentasche sorgt dafür, daß der Ton von einem der beiden Hörer öfter abreisst( in der Regel die Seite, die bei einer Kopfbewegung dann weiter entfernt ist. Ich habe das Gefühl, das hier ein schlechte Bluetooth Schnittstelle verbaut wurde. Wenn die Verbindung stabil ist, dann ist es ein Top Produkt für diesen Preis, aber hier ist Bluetooth nicht gleich Bluetooth.Was mich stutzig macht, das kaum jemand dieses Problem beschreibt, vielleicht hab ich aber auch nur einen Defekt oder ein Montagsprodukt.Für diesen Preis mach ich aber kein Fass auf, ich kann damit Leben :)

column1: Wireless Earbuds, yobola Bluetoth Earbuds, IPX5 Waterproof Wireless Headphones Touch Control, Bluetoth Headphones 5.1 Built-in Microphone, 25 Hrs with USB-C Charging with Running/Fitness
column3: Ich habe die Kopfhörer vor allem zum Hörbuch- und Musikhören unterwegs und zum Telefonieren gekauft. Ich bin nicht super anspruchsvoll was die Klangqualität angeht und bin damit daher zufrieden, könnte mir aber vorstellen, dass man Leute die da großen Wert drauf legen damit eher nicht überzeugen kann. Telefonieren klappt damit super, die Kopfhörer werden immer direkt erkannt und da ist die Qualität super, ich konnte bisher auch bei recht starkem Wind draußen oder im Auto bei viel Lärm draußen immer gut verstanden werden. Die Bedienung der Kopfhörer funktioniert auch super. Ich hatte etwas Sorge, dass sie im Ohr drücken, weil ich recht kleine Ohren habe. Wenn man die Kopfhörer aber nicht gerade 5 Stunden ohne Pause trägt, sind Sie sehr angenehm zu tragen. Insgesamt reichen die Kopfhörer für meine Bedürfnisse total aus und ich finde das Preis-Leistungsverhältnis daher top!

Se vi fate una passeggiata vanno piu' che bene e rimangono tranquillamente al loro posto, non credo siano adatte x fare sport o andare a correre.Circa 3-4 ore di batteria con ascolto continuato di musica, un po' cheap la custodia, meglio le cuffie.

column3: These work a treat. They connected straight away and just worked. I'm not an audiophile but, to my untrained ear, the sound quality was excellent and plenty loud enough. They are not noise-cancelling, or close fitting in-ear earbuds, so I wasn't expecting them to exclude external sounds - but they were OK for me even on a busy train. I also used them for phone calls and Teams calls on an iPad - no reports of poor voice. They're cost effective too and I really can't work out why you would want to spend the huge price difference to get Apple ones - performance really can't be that different, surely?

column1: Wireless Earbuds, yobola Bluetoth Earbuds, IPX5 Waterproof Wireless Headphones Touch Control, Bluetoth Headphones 5.1 Built-in Microphone, 25 Hrs with USB-C Charging with Running/Fitness
column3: I bought these ear buds for running mainly and I’ve found they do the job well enough for the price I paid. They have only fallen out once during use and that was my main concern before I purchased them so I’m happy about that. I haven’t quite got to grips with the controls on the side. Can’t seem to get them to do anything but switch off when I touch them. This also makes it tricky if you have to push them back in/reposition them as you end up switching off whatever is playing. But I’ll figure that out. I like the little charging box. I haven’t had to recharge them yet although I’ve used them several times so that’s really good. The sound quality is good listening to music or while on the phone but I was told I sounded echoey from the other end by one person.  That may happen with other brands though perhaps.All in all I’m very happy with my purchase.

column1: Wireless Earbuds, yobola Bluetoth Earbuds, IPX5 Waterproof Wireless Headphones Touch Control, Bluetoth Headphones 5.1 Built-in Microphone, 25 Hrs with USB-C Charging with Running/Fitness
column3: Hab mir die Kopfhörer gekauft für mein Xiaomi Reden Note 8T. Die Ware kam äusserst schnell an. Aufgrund einiger anderer Bewertungen war ich ein wenig verunsichert, weil ich die Marke nicht kannte. Die Sorge war aber völlig unbegründet. Das Case macht einen stabilem Eindruck. Die Kopfhörer haben die perfekte Form für meine Ohren und halten sowohl Radfahren auf Gelände sowie Joggen ohne rauszufallen. Die Ladedauer ist recht fix. Und der Akku der Kopfhörer scheint ewig zu halten. Am Handy wird angezeigt, wie hoch der Akkustand ist. Einen Sturz aus gut drei Metern haben sie auch schon überstanden (die Treppe runter auf Fließenboden).Der Sound ist gut. Umgebungstöne werden sehr gut gemindert bzw blockiert. Sowohl basslastige  Musik als auch Heavy Metal kommt damit gut zur Geltung.Ich bin begeistert! Würde ich immer wieder kaufen und kann die Kopfhörer nur empfehlen!

column1: Wireless Earbuds, yobola Bluetoth Earbuds, IPX5 Waterproof Wireless Headphones Touch Control, Bluetoth Headphones 5.1 Built-in Microphone, 25 Hrs with USB-C Charging with Running/Fitness
column3: Con una estética cuidada, estos auriculares inalámbricos cumplen su función. No son incómodos pero sí que tienes que acostumbrarte a ellos, sobre todo si tienes una oreja pequeña. La duración de la batería no es un problema y sirven  perfectamente para llevártelos al gimnasio cada mañana. Eso sí, en los días de mucho bullicio es difícil llegar a escuchar tu música y aun subiendo el volumen al máximo, no se escucha bien del todo. A pesar de esto, buenos auriculares.
